graphic.alt-text: Diagram illustrating the coagulation pathways and the impact of SARS-CoV-2 on the lungs. The intrinsic and extrinsic pathways converge to activate thrombin, leading to fibrin formation. SARS-CoV-2 attacks the lungs, causing vascular endothelial injury, platelet hyperactivity, inflammation, and immune system activation, resulting in thrombus formation.
